about.summary: Fast avro reader / writer using libavro

name: cyavro
raw_recipe:
{% set name = "cyavro" %}
{% set version = "0.6.2" %}
{% set avro_version = "1.7.*" %}

package:
  name: {{ name }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
   fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
   url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
   sha256: 780c164be6ed4be56f31f7c06ba46c13e3b0968f92824aa636a17e21a07d9e2d

build:
  number: 1
  skip: True  # [win or osx]
  script: python setup.py install

requirements:
    build:
        - python
        - cython
        - numpy x.x
        - avro {{ avro_version }}
        - six
        - jinja2
    run:
        - python
        - numpy x.x
        - avro {{ avro_version }}
        - pandas >=0.16
        - filelock
        - six
        - python-avro

test:
    imports:
        - cyavro
#   commands:
#       - conda inspect linkages cyavro

about:
  home: http://github.com/MaxPoint/cyavro
  license: BSD 3-clause
  summary: Fast avro reader / writer using libavro

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - mariusvniekerk
    - ericdill
